Description of incident: "An intruder entered the administrative office of the covered entity (CE) through a window. Nothing was stolen; however, the protected health information b(PHI) of 2,202 individuals was stored in the offic.  The PHI involved in the breach included names, medical information, medical inusreance information, addresses, phone numbers, and email addresss.  The CE provided breach notification to HHS, affected individuals, and the media. Followng the breach, the CE moved its administrative office to another location wih improved physical safeguards.  In addition, the CE instructed staff on its procedures for securely storing PHI, OCR obtained assurance that the CE implemented the corrective action listed above."More Information: https://ocrportal.hhs.gov/ocr/breach/breach_report.jsf;jsessionid=9BF4AF...
